sys_script_include.name: GetDepartment

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_726452_demo.GetDepartment</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetDepartment</name><script><![CDATA[var GetDepartment = Class.create();
GetDepartment.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        var employeeRecord = new GlideRecord("x_726452_demo_employee");
        employeeRecord.get(this.getParameter('syspram_employeeID'));
        return employeeRecord.department + '';
    },

    type: 'GetDepartment'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-24 08:24:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>4c99ce491b0401106b40c841604bcbd9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetDepartment</sys_name><sys_package display_value="demo" source="x_726452_demo">8a387a5c1b4001106b40c841604bcba5</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="demo">8a387a5c1b4001106b40c841604bcba5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4c99ce491b0401106b40c841604bcbd9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-24 08:24:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
